alert.note: Alert for Gates; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 23 at 7:56AM EDT until September 23 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HERTFORD AND CENTRAL GATES COUNTIES... At 756 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Gatesville, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Gatesville around 800 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Carter and Rays Beach. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
